song.englishname: What Can I Do? (with Paul Baloche)

english.segment1: When I see the beauty. Of the sunset's glory. Amazing artistry. Across the evening sky. When I feel the mystery. Of a distant galaxy. It awes and humbles me. To be loved by a God so high
english.segment2: What can I do but thank you. What can I do but give. My life to you. Hallelujah, hallelujah. What can I do but praise you. Every day make everything I do. A hallelujah, a hallelujah. Hallelujah
english.segment3: When I hear the story. Of a God of mercy. Who shared humanity. And suffered by our side. Of the cross they nailed you to. That could not hold you. Now you're making all things new. By the power of your risen life
english.segment4: Paul Baloche & Graham Kendrick. Copyright Â© 2005 Integrity's Hosanna! Music. 1000 Cody Road, Mobile, AL 36695 and Make Way Music
